param.name: validity_days
param.note: The number of days a license should be considered as expiring soon Default: 60

note.title: E-Mail subject according to the found license state
note.p: Can be used in a following email job

note.title: E-Mail Body according to the found license state
note.p: Can be used in a following email job

note.title: What is the purpose of this job?
note.p:
Users of subscription licenses receive warnings and errors about expiration of licenses from the JOC Cockpit GUI. Users would like to receive e-mail notification about upcoming license expiration and expired licenses.
Returncodes:
2: license check not applicable for open source license
2: license has expired
3: license expiration warning when expiration is in less than validity_days days
